Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: {? | $(this.trait:engraving) | engraved}{? | $(this.trait:surface:material) | $(this.trait:surface:material)-topped,}{? | $(this.trait:figurine:material) | relievo}{? | $(this.trait:color) | $(this.trait:color)}{? | $(this.trait:material) | $(this.trait:material)} $(this.trait:brief){? | $(this.trait:statue:material) |, boasting $(this.trait:statue:color) $(this.trait:statue:material) columns, or columned, column-supported}

A carved $(this.trait:figurine:material) $(this.trait:figurine:type) relief has been centrally set against a wide $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) backdrop that composes the front of the $(this.trait:brief). Matching the $(this.trait:figurine:type), the edging surrounding the counter has been carved into a decorative relief of $(this.trait:figurine:material) acanthus leaves.

A carved $(this.trait:figurine:material) $(this.trait:figurine:type) relief has been centrally set against a wide $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) backdrop that composes the front of the $(this.trait:brief). Matching the $(this.trait:figurine:type), the edging surrounding the counter has been carved into a decorative relief of $(this.trait:figurine:material) acanthus leaves.

Either end of the $(this.trait:brief) is supported from below by $(this.trait:statue:color) $(this.trait:statue:material) columns, delicately tooled into the shape of $(this.trait:statue:type)s. The $(this.trait:statue:color) $(this.trait:statue:material) supports are encased; top, bottom, and sides by a framework of $(this.trait:figurine:material) relief edging.

Either end of the $(this.trait:brief) is supported from below by $(this.trait:statue:color) $(this.trait:statue:material) columns, delicately tooled into the shape of $(this.trait:statue:type)s. The $(this.trait:statue:color) $(this.trait:statue:material) supports are encased; top, bottom, and sides by a framework of $(this.trait:figurine:material) relief edging.

The flat, smooth surface of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief){? | $(this.trait:surface:material) | has been lain with a slab of $(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:color) $(this.trait:surface:material). Typically crafted from the same material as the rest of the furniture, the countertop of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief) has instead been covered end to end in $(this.trait:surface:color)$(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:material), lending a varied taste of opulence to the $(this.trait:brief)}.

The flat, smooth surface of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief){? | $(this.trait:surface:material) | has been lain with a slab of $(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:color) $(this.trait:surface:material). Typically crafted from the same material as the rest of the furniture, the countertop of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief) has instead been covered end to end in $(this.trait:surface:color)$(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:material), lending a varied taste of opulence to the $(this.trait:brief)}.
